title: Melt in your mouth chocolate chip brownies
ingredients: ['180g (6oz) plain chocolate', '90g (3 oz) softened butter', '200g (7 oz) sugar (I use a mix of light and dark brown sugar)', '60g (2 oz) plain flour', '60g (2 oz) cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '4 eggs', '90g (3 oz) chocolate chips']
